title: Trouble Opening League due to PVP.net Patcher Kernel error?
body: Is there anyone else that cant open the league client due to PVP.net not working? Me and my brother both have HP laptops and league seems to not want to open at all. But it only seems to be the regular launcher, the Alpha Client still works fine on my computer.

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel Errors usually happen as a result of missing administrative privileges that League relies on to run properly. I suggest hopping onto our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for the most common steps to resolve this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
